class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">Roses </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">cease </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">bloom, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ccff">Sir, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b8d058">Violets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">done </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#50748c">Bumblebees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">solemn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">flight </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">passed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">beyond </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span style="color:#ffd04c">paused </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">gather </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4840ff">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">idle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#2cff7c">lie </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">Auburn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">take </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">flowers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ccff">pray! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
